short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Gartner extension (formerly Gartner Everywhere) is a convenient way to discover Gartner research.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⇒	Our distinctive extension provides easy access to the most relevant content, while protecting your privacy and security.

⇒	Discover exclusive Gartner content from an ever expanding curated and structured resources


What it Offers:

☆ Easy Access
Just install the Gartner extension and you are ready to go. Get Gartner content alongside google search results at ease

☆ Comprehensive Selection of Research
Most sought-after research available with Gartner exclusive insights spanning across an ever growing pool of domains

☆ Non-intrusive
The extension panel’s position and interface is such that it does not interfere with your google search experience

☆ Protected Privacy
We do not store any personal information or your google search history


How to Install:

1.	Click “Add to Chrome” to install the extension in your browser 

2.	Log in to Gartner.com and be sure to click “Remember me”

3.	Now you are ready to start your search on Google


Eligibility Requirements:

•	You must be a Gartner client and Licensed User registered on www.gartner.com.

•	The Gartner extension must be installed and configured on your personal browser.


===================================================
